title: The Feverman
description: A man brings his ailing daughter to the "Feverman;" a man known for his ability to heal the sick by physically 'fighting' the disease or fever. But the local doctor protests. The price required by the Feverman from the man is much less than the price the Feverman, himself, has to pay and when the doctor interferes, he finds out exactly what the cost of a life is.

title: Holly's House
description: Holly, the lead in a children's TV series, isn't the nice puppet she pretends to be.

title: New York Honey
description: A greedy man convinces his eccentric beekeeper neighbor to market the neighbor's fantastic tasting honey.

title: The Vampire Hunter
description: Can the famous vampire hunter save his friend before his old enemy can kill the young man, or worse, turn him into another bloodsucker?

title: My Zombie Lover
description: One night each year the dead come back to life, and a zombie hunter finds to his horror his daughter had fallen in love with one.

title: Where's the Rest of Me?
description: A mad scientist keeps a cadaver alive to harvest its organs.

title: The Legacy
description: Dale finds the private sanctuary of Fulton Pierce, a famous, dead, horror actor. Dale can see Fulton's image in the old make-up case that was owned by the actor, and his life soon goes down a dark road.

title: Sleeping Dragon
description: A mysterious artifact is found outside Reno, Nevada, and there's a monster living in it.

title: Rouse Him Not
description: A painter finds out that something weird lives in her basement.

title: Fools' Gold
description: Three construction workers find a hidden cave with treasure guarded by a troll.

title: Glim-Glim
description: The last three survivors on earth find an alien who can help them.

title: Parents from Space
description: An abused child's foster parents have their bodies taken over by aliens.

title: The Mother Instinct
description: An elderly woman develops a miracle formula from plants, and her abusive son-in-laws wants to steal it.

title: Their Divided Self
description: Dr. Blackman tries to counsel two heads on the same body that constantly fight with each other.

title: Taps
description: A woman kills her boyfriend then dismembers him, but his leg gets revenge.

title: The Match Game
description: Four teenagers go into a haunted Victorian mansion and play a game where each tell part of a ghost story while a match burns, but the story comes true.

title: Rain Dance
description: A couple who exploit native Americans get more than they bargain for when they buy a rain-making idol.

title: All in a Day's Work
description: A man who is haunted by his doppleganger asks a witch to help him raise a demon to defeat it.

title: La Strega
description: A young man tries to destroy a beautiful witch, whom he thinks has placed his mother under a deadly curse.

title: A Bond of Silk
description: A newlywed couple book themselves into the basement suite of a fancy hotel which soon turns out to be the lair of a monstrously sized arachnid.

title: Jar
description: While managing a remote inn near a wilderness swamp, an innkeeper makes ends meet by selling jars of items from the swamp. One particular item helps others to "meet ends". A curious private eye checks into the inn in search of a missing person, and meets Ann, who has brought her husband there to get him "away from it all."

title: The Demons
description: A greedy alien named Arcturus tries to enslaved a demon to grant his wishes, but instead gets a poor insurance agent from Chicago named Arthur Gammet. Poor Arthur must grant the alien's wishes even if it means getting a demon of his own.

title: Reaper
description: An elderly man in a nursing home makes a deal with Death.

title: Half as Old as Time
description: An old man asks for his estranged daughter's help in finding a secret Native American fountain of youth.

title: Museum Hearts
description: A man and two women are trapped in a museum basement with the ancient bog body of a druid priestess.

title: Mr. Swlabr
description: A boy discovers a toy in a cereal box that miraculously comes to life as a mischievous reptile.

title: Perchance to Dream
description: Following a blow to the head, Alex's dreams appear to be becoming reality.

title: One Wolf's Family
description: Anya, a girl who comes from a family of wolves, plans to marry Stanley, but her father objects because Stanley is a were-hyena.

title: The Offering
description: A man who is in a hospital following a car accident begins to see terrifying apparitions of giant insect-like creatures.

title: Far Below
description: A man sent to investigate why a subway maintenance crew is paid so highly gets more than he bargained for.

title: Micro Minds
description: An astronomy student believes she has contacted an alien lifeform that is frighteningly close to earth.

title: Refugee
description: A former spy is enlisted to retrieve a defecting physicist, but an unexpected visitor to the safehouse where they're hiding complicates things.

title: The Gift
description: A rich kid who's been kidnapped for ransom encounters a mysterious beast that offers him a supernatural way out.

title: The Bargain
description: A lonely bookstore owner goes to extreme lengths to transform her appearance in order to woo a handsome customer.

title: The Family Man
description: A kid who doesn't like his mother's new boyfriend discovers the man's true reptilian nature when he wears his old glasses.

title: Stressed Environment
description: A scientist spends 12yrs raising rats in a stressed environment in the hopes of evolving intelligence in the subjects.

title: Murray's Monster
description: A psychiatrist attempts to use a man who can monstrously manifests his repressed anger while hypnotized.

title: Cellmates
description: A spoiled rich boy goes to jail in Mexico after running down and killing a child with his car. He feels confident he will get out with his daddy's money but a weird old man tells him he is in "the bad cell" and no one leaves ever.

title: A Shave and a Haircut, Two Bites
The Waiting Game
description: After a nuclear blowout, only two factions remain. Humans inside of a small locked shelter, and nuclear holocaust vampires. With the two sides only separated by a small digital code on the outside of the shelter.
